channel.title: Blogs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Portfolio

item.title: Personal interests
item.description: Aside from my professional interests, I am an out going guy that likes to live life to the fullest. I believe that we live to learn and to explore. With that said, I often find myself exploring various hobbies such as learning musical instruments, exploring nature, and digital arts.

item.title: Software interest
item.description: I discovered my interest in software as I progressed through college. I began to find myself pursuing varying personal projects to enrich my knowledge in the field. These projects had brought me much joy and I decided that I wanted to pursue a career in software engineering. I like to live a life full of adventure and will always be interested to learn new things and to explore new career opportunities.
